insert: insert into spring_blogs (blog_no, blog_title, blog_writer, blog_content) values (spring_blog_seq.nextval, #{title},#{writer.id},#{content})
update: update spring_blogs set blog_title = #{title}, blog_content = #{content}, blog_likes = #{likes}, blog_comment_counts = #{commentCounts} where blog_no = #{no}
select: select a.blog_no as no, a.blog_title as title, a.blog_writer as "writer.id", a.blog_content as content, a.blog_likes as likes, a.blog_comment_counts as commentCounts, a.blog_create_date as createDate, b.user_name as "writer.name", b.user_email as "writer.email" from spring_blogs A, spring_users B where a.blog_writer = b.user_id and a.blog_no = #{value};
